subject:
The Internet Patrol -  Is Virtual Rape Crying Virtual Wolf?
   Is it Even Possible?
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol
http://www.theinternetpatrol.com

Is Virtual Rape Crying Virtual Wolf?

I read an article this week about "virtual rape".  Yes, really.  That would be virtual sexual assault on your virtual online character or persona.  This is all coming out now because, I kid you not, someone from Second Life reported a virtual rape to the police in Brussels.  And they are investigating it!
 

Read more here: Is Virtual Rape Crying Virtual Wolf?
